name: hotPotatoCloser
description: This closed open HPs in Dynamo DB table OpenHotPotatoes.

scripts.create-aws-function: aws --profile landrys lambda create-function --function-name openHotPotatoMailerHandler --runtime nodejs6.10 --role arn:aws:iam::419745589400:role/lambda_basic_execution --description 'Send emails to respective store managers including open hot potatoes over a day old from dynamo db table OpenHotPotatoes' --handler src/openHotPotatoMailerHandler.openHotPotatoMailerHandler --zip-file fileb://dist/package.zip
scripts.update-aws-function: aws --profile landrys lambda update-function-code --function-name openHotPotatoMailerHandler --zip-file fileb://dist/package.zip

author: Fabio Piergentili
